tasks.label: Run Echidna (Docker, long run)
tasks.command: sudo docker run --rm --network host -e SOLC_PATH=/usr/local/bin/solc -v "${workspaceFolder}":/code -v /dev/null:/code/foundry.toml -w /code trailofbits/echidna bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; curl -sSfL https://binaries.soliditylang.org/linux-amd64/solc-linux-amd64-v0.8.24+commit.e11b9ed9 -o /usr/local/bin/solc && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/solc && echidna test/echidna/Echidna_ControllerHubProps.sol --contract Echidna_ControllerHubProps --config test/echidna/echidna.yaml --test-limit 25000 --seq-len 64'
